projects.title: DMS — Document Management System
projects.description: An enterprise-grade document management system with a complete document lifecycle: structured creation with full revision history, two-stage approval workflows (preparer → approver), targeted distribution to departments and users, and tracked read confirmations. Features real-time SSE notifications via Redis Pub/Sub, async email delivery through BullMQ with automated reminders and escalation, role-based access control, soft-delete architecture, and a full audit trail. Built with Next.js 16, Bun, TypeScript, PostgreSQL (Drizzle ORM), and Redis.
